text: Jan Bert Lieve Vertonghen (born 24 April 1987) is a Belgian football player. He plays as a centre-back for Anderlecht and the Belgium national team. == References == Category:1987 births Category:Belgian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:Premier League players Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players Category:2018 FIFA World Cup players Category:People from East Flanders Category:Living people Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2024 players
title: Jan Vertonghen
